name: Keeper of Souls
description: At 17th level, you can seize a trace of vitality from a parting soul to heal the living. When an enemy you can see dies within 30 feet of you, you or one ally within 30 feet regains hit points equal to the enemy’s number of Hit Dice. You can use this feature only if you aren't incapacitated. Once you use it, you can't do so again until the start of your next turn.
